text: Vladimir Petrovich Averchev (; 1 November 1946 â€“ 24 May 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a Deputy of the State Duma between 1993 and 2000. Averchev was a member of the Yabloko Party. He was born in Pilninsky District, Gorky Oblast, Russian SFSR, Soviet Union. Averchev died on 24 May 2022 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Politicians from Nizhny Novgorod
title: Vladimir Averchev
